name: Cangaço StandOff
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

P1: Shoot with S or SPACE
P2: Shoot with K or ENTER

Arrow keys to navigate menu
S, K, SPACE or ENTER to select

###################################################

One bullet, one shot, one moment, it's all that standing between survival and death in the desert.

Are you the fastest shooter these lands have met? Prove yourself!

Play in multiplayer mode or against an incredibly smart A.I. (actually, it's just a timer! Wow!)

But don't you dare to shoot before the sign... theses lands have no mercy for cheaters.

###################################################

Made in under 48h for the 24th GM48
